#Using Matplotlib

## Draw ACF Example

```
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

from statsmodels.tsa.stattools import acf, pacf

lags = 20

glag_acf = acf(tsdata, nlags=lags)

acf_df = pd.DataFrame({'acf': list(lag_acf), 'lag': range(lags+1)}) 

ggplot(aes(x='lag', y='acf'), data=acf_df) + geom_point()  + geom_hline(yintercept=[0.1, -0.1], color="red", size=2)



```
